translations: v.劈啪作响；大声唠叨，喋喋不休
n.噼啪声，啪嗒声；唠叨，喋喋不休

phrs.translation: 哔剥声, 噼啪响, 吊砂条
止回阀, 瓣阀, 逆止阀, 翼门阀
咔嗒咔嗒之声, 电车狂
阀箱, 舌阀箱, 舌阀, 瓣阀箱
阀瓣, 翻译, 阀瓣英语

sentences.sentence: Her bracelets were going clack-clack-clack, she was shaking so hard.
sentences.translation: 她使劲晃着，手链咔嚓作响。

sentences.sentence: Its clickety-clack sounded like a "roomful of ladies knitting."
sentences.translation: 它的咔嗒咔嗒的声音听起来像“满屋子的女士正在编织(roomful of ladies knitting)。”

sentences.sentence: The old woman will clack for a long time when she meets her neighbours.
sentences.translation: 这位老太婆遇到邻居时总要唠叨半天。
